mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_CD, B.BOOK_CD, C.QUANTITY, B.BOOK_NM, B.PRICE FROM CART C INNER JOIN BOOK B ON B.BOOK_CD = C.BOOK_CD INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_ID = C.MEMBER_ID WHERE C.MEMBER_ID=#{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK B INNER JOIN CART C ON B.BOOK_CD = C.BOOK_CD SET B.STOCK = B.STOCK - C.QUANTITY WHERE BOOK_CD=#{bookCd} AND B.STOCK >= C.QUANTITY
